statements: SELECT * FROM authorized_personnel;
SELECT name, access_level FROM authorized_personnel WHERE access_level = 2;
SELECT id, name, badge_id FROM authorized_personnel WHERE badge_id = 'B12345';
SELECT * FROM authorized_personnel ORDER BY access_level DESC;
SELECT name, access_level FROM authorized_personnel WHERE access_level > 1 ORDER BY access_level ASC;
SELECT name, access_level FROM authorized_personnel WHERE access_level > 3 ORDER BY access_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM authorized_personnel WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) AND access_level >= 2;
SELECT name, badge_id FROM authorized_personnel WHERE name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, badge_id, access_level FROM authorized_personnel WHERE badge_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM authorized_personnel WHERE access_level BETWEEN 2 AND 5 ORDER BY badge_id ASC, name DESC;
SELECT * FROM authorized_personnel WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, credentials FROM authorized_personnel WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT id, entry_time FROM door_verification WHERE verified = TRUE ORDER BY entry_time DESC;
SELECT id, personnel_id FROM door_verification WHERE entry_time >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT name, credentials FROM authorized_personnel WHERE name = 'John' AND credentials LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT * FROM authorized_personnel;
SELECT name, credentials FROM authorized_personnel ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM authorized_personnel WHERE id = 1001;
SELECT personnel_id, verified FROM door_verification WHERE entry_time BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY entry_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM authorized_personnel INNER JOIN door_verification ON authorized_personnel.id = door_verification.personnel_id;
SELECT * FROM authorized_personnel;
SELECT name, department FROM authorized_personnel WHERE access_level='Admin';
SELECT id, name, access_level FROM authorized_personnel ORDER BY access_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM credentials WHERE username='admin';
SELECT personnel_id, access_time FROM door_access_logs ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM authorized_personnel;
SELECT name, access_level FROM authorized_personnel WHERE department = 'IT';

SELECT credentials.username, authorized_personnel.name FROM credentials JOIN authorized_personnel ON credentials.personnel_id = authorized_personnel.id WHERE authorized_personnel.access_level = 'Admin';
SELECT department, COUNT(*) AS personnel_count FROM authorized_personnel GROUP BY department ORDER BY personnel_count DESC;
SELECT MAX(access_time) AS latest_access_time, MIN(access_time) AS earliest_access_time FROM door_access_logs;
SELECT * FROM authorized_personnel;
SELECT name, employee_id FROM authorized_personnel ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT name, access_level FROM authorized_personnel WHERE access_level = 'Admin';
SELECT employee_id, access_code FROM door_access_credentials WHERE access_code = '1234';
SELECT log_id, employee_id, access_time FROM access_logs ORDER BY access_time ASC;
SELECT name, employee_id, access_level FROM authorized_personnel;
SELECT * FROM door_access_credentials WHERE access_code = '123456';
SELECT log_id, employee_id, access_time FROM access_logs ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_clearance WHERE access_level = 'High' OR access_level = 'Medium';

SELECT authorized_personnel.name, authorized_personnel.access_level, security_clearance.access_level FROM authorized_personnel JOIN security_clearance ON authorized_personnel.access_level = security_clearance.access_level;
SELECT * FROM authorized_personnel;
SELECT name, username FROM authorized_personnel ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM door_access_logs WHERE personnel_id = 3;
SELECT level_name FROM access_levels WHERE level_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM personnel_access_mapping JOIN authorized_personnel ON personnel_access_mapping.personnel_id = authorized_personnel.id;
SELECT * FROM authorized_personnel WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, username FROM authorized_personnel ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT ap.name, al.level_name FROM authorized_personnel ap JOIN personnel_access_mapping pam ON ap.id = pam.personnel_id JOIN access_levels al ON pam.level_id = al.level_id;
SELECT * FROM door_access_logs WHERE access_time > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT ap.name, sc.clearance_level FROM authorized_personnel ap JOIN security_clearance sc ON ap.id = sc.personnel_id WHERE sc.clearance_level >= 3;
